item.title: Su Lee
item.description: The power of an artist is to feel the ailments of society and diagnose it before we even realize whatâ€™s going on. With all that’s going on in the world, Su Lee is the sonic physician we all need right now. Her song “I’ll Just Dance” was a viral hit on YouTube partly because of her dancing in her bedroom studio, but also because she was able to put to words the vibes of this crazy year and make us feel okay with it for once.
